task.name: Example_Task
task.description: The simplest task, ran by a python engine.

script.code:
# # PUT YOUR CODE HERE #
# EXAMPLE def dotproduct(X,Y): dotproduct = 0 for i,j in zip(X,Y): dotproduct += i*j return dotproduct
X = [6,5,4] Y = [3,2,1]
print('Dot product between X and Y is: ', dotproduct(X,Y))
